DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the range of target IOPs set for glaucoma patients starting monotherapy with bimatoprost and to evaluate patient and physician satisfaction with bimatoprost in "real-world" settings
DOC.brief_title: Internet-based, Naturalistic Evaluation of Tolerability and Individual Patient Target Pressures With Bimatoprost 0.03% in Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Patients with either openangle glaucoma or ocular hypertension were eligible if they needed bilateral IOP reduction beyond what was achieved with their current medication, or if they were intolerant of other IOPlowering medications.
